docs.snippet: RIO DE JANIERO, Brazil, July 10--Both the Japanese steamship Brasil Maru, carrying the Brazilian delegation to the Havana conference, and the Uruguay, with the Argentine delegation, sailed today for Santiago, from where the delegates will entrain for...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANIERO, Brazil, July 10--Both the Japanese steamship Brasil Maru, carrying the Brazilian delegation to the Havana conference, and the Uruguay, with the Argentine delegation, sailed today for Santiago, from where the delegates will entrain for Havana.
